channel.title: Save spawned objects in characters file
channel.description: How can I make it so when a person (an admin) spawns an object (e.g a prayer altar) the object is saved to his character file and it shows up only when he is logged in. So when an admin types ::object (id) the object is spawned and saved to his character file and the object is shown only when the person is logged in. Plz help

item.title: Save spawned objects in characters file
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

How can I make it so when a person (an admin) spawns an object (e.g a prayer altar) the object is saved to his character file and it shows up only when he is logged in. So when an admin types ::object (id) the object is spawned and saved to his character file and the object is shown only when the person is logged in.
Plz help

Read full topic
